F

FILE_EXTENSION_SEPARATOR - 类 中的静态变量cn.trinea.android.common.util.FileUtils
 
FileNameRule - cn.trinea.android.common.service中的接口
File name rule, used when saving images in ImageSDCardCache
FileNameRuleCurrentTime - cn.trinea.android.common.service.impl中的类
File name rule, used when saving images in ImageSDCardCache use FileNameRuleCurrentTime.TimeRule as file name use file suffix in url as target file suffix
FileNameRuleCurrentTime(FileNameRuleCurrentTime.TimeRule) - 类 的构造器cn.trinea.android.common.service.impl.FileNameRuleCurrentTime
 
FileNameRuleCurrentTime.TimeRule - cn.trinea.android.common.service.impl中的枚举
Time Rule FileNameRuleCurrentTime.TimeRule.YEAR year of current time, E.g., at 2012-7-6 14:37:58.365 PM result is 2012 FileNameRuleCurrentTime.TimeRule.DAY_OF_MONTH indicating the day of the month.
FileNameRuleImageUrl - cn.trinea.android.common.service.impl中的类
File name rule, used when saving images in ImageSDCardCache use image url as file name, replace char with _ if not letter or number use file suffix in url as target file suffix
FileNameRuleImageUrl() - 类 的构造器cn.trinea.android.common.service.impl.FileNameRuleImageUrl
 
FileUtils - cn.trinea.android.common.util中的类
File Utils Read or write file FileUtils.readFile(String) read file FileUtils.readFileToList(String) read file to string list FileUtils.writeFile(String, String, boolean) write file FileUtils.writeFile(String, InputStream) write file Operate file FileUtils.getFileExtension(String) FileUtils.getFileName(String) FileUtils.getFileNameWithoutExtension(String) FileUtils.getFileSize(String) FileUtils.deleteFile(String) FileUtils.isFileExist(String) FileUtils.isFolderExist(String) FileUtils.makeFolders(String) FileUtils.makeDirs(String)
FileUtils() - 类 的构造器cn.trinea.android.common.util.FileUtils
 
fullWidthToHalfWidth(String) - 类 中的静态方法cn.trinea.android.common.util.StringUtils
transform half width char to full width char fullWidthToHalfWidth(null) = null; fullWidthToHalfWidth("") = ""; fullWidthToHalfWidth(new String(new char[] {12288})) = " "; fullWidthToHalfWidth("锛锛锛锛锛锛) = "!
